verses.name: John 5:37
verses.text: And the Father himself, which hath sent me, hath borne witness of me. Ye have neither heard his voice at any time, nor seen his shape.

verses.name: John 5:38
verses.text: And ye have not his word abiding in you: for whom he hath sent, him ye believe not.

verses.name: John 5:39
verses.text: Search the scriptures; for in them ye think ye have eternal life: and they are they which testify of me.

verses.name: John 5:40
verses.text: And ye will not come to me, that ye might have life.

verses.name: John 5:41
verses.text: I receive not honour from men.

verses.name: John 5:42
verses.text: But I know you, that ye have not the love of God in you.
